1 import re, shutil, tempfile
2 import os
3 import sys
4 
5 
11 
12 def sed_inplace(filename, pattern, repl):
13  '''
14  Perform the pure-Python equivalent of in-place `sed` substitution: e.g.,
15  `sed -i -e 's/'${pattern}'/'${repl}' "${filename}"`.
16  '''
17  pattern_compiled = re.compile(pattern)
18  with tempfile.NamedTemporaryFile(mode='w', delete=False) as tmp_file:
19  with open(filename) as src_file:
20  for line in src_file:
21  tmp_file.write(pattern_compiled.sub(repl, line))
22  shutil.copystat(filename, tmp_file.name)
23  shutil.move(tmp_file.name, filename)
24 
25 def change_DVFS_mode(DVFS_mode):
26  sed_inplace("./config_SoC/SoC.BAL_only.txt", "add_new_resource resource_type LTL.*", "add_new_resource resource_type LTL resource_name A7 resource_ID 0 capacity 4 num_supported_functionalities 94 DVFS_mode " + DVFS_mode)
27  sed_inplace("./config_SoC/SoC.BAL_only.txt", "add_new_resource resource_type BIG.*", "add_new_resource resource_type BIG resource_name A15 resource_ID 1 capacity 4 num_supported_functionalities 94 DVFS_mode " + DVFS_mode)
28
